title: Cost Minimization of Labor and Capital

content.question: At a given quantity of output of a firm, if the marginal product of capital equals the marginal product of labor and the wage rate equals the rental rate of capital, then

choices.label: the firm is producing that quantity at the lowest cost
the firm should use more capital and less labor to minimize cost
the firm should use less capital and more labor to minimize cost
the firm should use more of both inputs to increase quantity
the firm should use less of both inputs to increase quantity

content.answer: the firm is producing that quantity at the lowest cost

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets
